sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: C. sativa var. Bedrobinol plants were supplied by Bedrocan BV (Veendam, Netherlands) and C. sativa var. Fedora seeds were acquired from Botanik Sämereien GmbH (Wädenswil, Switzerland). Studies were conducted with the permissions of No. 458 64 16 and 458 49 89 issued by the Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices (BfArM), Germany.

sec.title: Consent for publication
sec.p: Not applicable as the manuscript contains no individual identifying data.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

sec.title: Publisher’s Note
sec.p: Springer Nature remains neutral with regard to jurisdictional claims in published maps and institutional affiliations.
